<div class="home-text">

This project applies **Linear Mixed Models (LMM)** to analyze the evolution of **happiness scores** across countries and years, using data from the World Happiness Report.

We distinguish two model components: **Fixed effects** and **Random effects**.

This structure captures both global trends and country-level variations over time.
